posts.post_title: FS: PSA 3 Matty white cap (PRICE DROP 9/17)
posts.post_content:
PRICE DROP ON MATTY

Have these available. The Cobb I just got back from PSA and the Matty came from my collection and was socked away for a few years. PM me with any questions. "I'll take it" trumps any ongoing negotiations

$SOLD Cobb bat on PSA 1
$[STRIKE]2000[/STRIKE] $1900 Mathewson white cap PSA 3


[url=https://flic.kr/p/2qg98TV][img]https://live.staticflickr.com/65535/53992589871_bf9fdfb31d_b.jpg[/img][/url]
